description: Rock Art Studies: A Bibliographic Database is a compilation in progress which was begun in March, 1993. Currently the database contains over 27,000 citations to the world's rock art literature, with an emphasis on English language and North American citations. Over 9500 of these citations are held in the compiler's personal library. These and many others were reviewed for annotation. With the "r11" release, the database became available on the Internet as a project of the Bay Area Rock Art Research Association Archive, Bancroft Library, University of California, Berkeley ( http://bancroft.berkeley.edu/collections/rockart.html

is_part_of.title: Rock Art Studies: A Bibliographic Database

title: Rock Art Studies: A Bibliographic Database
